### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Reference Number
WS3187087946-Doc3717412033

#### Tender Title
Supply and Delivery of Stand-up, Counterbalance Electric Forklift

#### Tender Status
Cancelled

#### Tender Description
Environment and Climate Change Canada requires the supply and delivery of a new stand-up, counterbalance electric forklift to Yellowknife, Northwest Territories. The forklift will be used internally at the department to service pallet racking's, load and off-load trucks. The new forklift must be delivered by March 31, 2023. 

#### Tender Requirements
* Supply and delivery of a new stand-up, counterbalance electric forklift
* All warranty provisions must be included
* Delivery to Yellowknife, Northwest Territories
* Deadline for delivery: March 31, 2023

#### Tenders Are Required To
Be submitted in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in the tender package. 

#### Bidding Process
A Risk-Based Assessment will be used to evaluate tenders. 

#### Procurement Method
Competitive - Open bidding

#### Closing Date
January 31, 2023, 14:00 HNE (Halifax, Nova Scotia)

#### Contact Information
Nkechi Onwuama Ezechinedu
Email: nkechi.onwuamaezechinedu@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Phone: None
Fax: None

#### Important Notes
* This tender cancels and supersedes previous tender number Doc3599508660, dated July 27, 2022.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided, upon request, to bidders/offerors/suppliers who bid on the previous solicitation.

#### Important Documents
 The following documents are annexed to this notice:

* Tender package
* Terms and Conditions
* Confidentiality Agreement

#### Supplier Information
Suppliers seeking this contract must be registered with Public Services and Procurement Canada's Industry Services Branch. Industry Services Branch will screen suppliers for issues such as business status, and available goods and services. Suppliers with issues will not be eligible to bid on the contract. You will be notified in writing if issues arise during this review process.

### Closing Information
Further instructions on the tender are explained in the notice package.
